channel.title: shalini on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in shalini on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Satham Illatha Thanimai Kaetten
item.description: This song is from a movie called Amarkalam, starring Ajit and Shalini. The song is sung by SPB and supposed to have been breathless in the movie.

item.title: Pachai Niramae: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: The lyrics of this song uses vivid imagery of colours to describe love and the woman he is in love with. The song begins with him shouting out in joy that she smiled at him.
